predicate.note: Frames file for 'fray' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: Its relationship with parent General Electric Co. had been frayed [*-1] since a big Kidder insider-trading scandal two years ago .
example.arg: [*-1] -> Its relationship with parent General Electric Co.
since a big Kidder insider-trading scandal two years ago

example.name: intransitive
example.text: But the build-up of S&P futures sell orders weighed on the market , and the link with stocks began [*-1] to fray again .
